awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 6 wins.

fullplot: The mysterious death of an enigmatic young man newly arrived in the suburb of Wetherby releases the long-repressed, dark passions of some of its residents.
plot: The mysterious death of an enigmatic young man newly arrived in the suburb of Wetherby releases the long-repressed, dark passions of some of its residents.
title: Wetherby
